title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify the file (e.g., move an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon
4) A dialog will appear
5) Browse for a valid container location
6) Type the filename without specifying the file extension
7) Click Ok

Observe that the file is added to the Navigator in the specified location, but the file extension is not shown.
EB: After performing the steps above, the file should be saved with a file extension and the Navigator should display the file with the appropriate java file icon.
